text: Not Julia related, but hopefully someone can help: has anyone encountered an issue where vim won't 'remember' the correct word boundaries? I have `set nocompatible` in my `.vimrc`, and for a while things work right, but then vim seems to revert the the vi style word movements where only whitespace denotes a new word. I can fix it by executing `:set nocompatible`, but vim isn't actually forgetting that setting because `:set nocompatible?` still reports `nocompatible` . Eventually it reverts to the vi behavior again, and I have to `:set nocompatible` again. Anyone know what's  up?
